sparsemediation 0.0.0.9000

    • sparse_mediation

    sparsemediation

    Conducting sparse medition

    From github:

    library(devtools)
install_github("seonjoo/sparsemediation")
library(sparsemediation)

    Usage

    The sparse.mediation function conducts sparse mediation for the specified tuning parameters for elastic net. Cross-validation is possible using cv.sparse.mediation.

    ```{r} N=100 V=50 set.seed(1234) a = rbinom(V,1,0.1)5;b<-a X = scale(rnorm(N)) M = X %% t(a)+ matrix(rnorm(NV),N,V) Y = 10X + M %*% b + rnorm(N)

    cvfit<-cv.sparse.mediation(X, M, Y, tol = 10^(-10), K = 4, max.iter = 100,lambda = log(1 + (1:10)/25), tau=c(0.5,1,2), multicore = 4, seednum = 1e+06)

    fit<-sparse.mediation(X,M,Y,tol=10^(-10),max.iter=100,lambda = cvfit$cv.lambda,tau=cvfit$cv.tau)
